ModMetaData.name: Character Studio
ModMetaData.author: Character Studio Team
ModMetaData.description:
一个综合性的角色创作引擎，允许玩家可视化编辑外观、装配能力、配置AI行为，并导出为独立的皮肤与单位模组。
功能特点： - 可视化皮肤编辑器（所见即所得） - 能力装配系统 - AI行为配置 - 一键导出为独立模组
A comprehensive character creation engine that allows players to visually edit appearances, assemble abilities, configure AI behaviors, and export as standalone skin and unit mods.
